Description: Rectangular gold foil plaque: incised with images depicting jewellery and funerary items as painted inside Middle Kingdom coffins. For sewing onto mummy-wrappings.
Curator's comments: To be published by Isabel Stuenkel, MMA, New York, in FS Roessler-Koehler (JHT, 13/9/11) Quack, J.F. 2022. Altägyptische Amulette und ihre Handhabung. Orientalische Religionen in der Antike 31. Tübingen, p. 290.
